articles.title: 2023 MLB All-Star Game: National League ends 9-game losing streak behind Elías Díaz home run - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: The American League was leading 2-1 heading into the eighth inning Tuesday and had a chance in the ninth.
articles.content: SEATTLE The National League players ended a nine-game losing streak against their American League counterparts on Tuesday in the MLB All-Star Game. After trailing for much of the contest, they went a… [+7515 chars]

articles.title: Hit with a Bank of America fee for insufficient funds? Here's what to expect after its order to pay $250 million - MarketWatch
articles.description: The $250 million sum includes $100 million in redress to affected customers, regulators said
articles.content: Federal regulators have ordered Bank of America to pay $100 million to customers for allegedly mistreating them with unfair fees, withholding credit-card rewards, and opening fake accounts.The good n… [+5011 chars]
